name: LDAP
description: The LDAP Connector provides access for LDAP servers through a simple web services interface to do CURD (Create, Update, Read, Delete) operations on LDAP entries.

operations.name: addEntry
operations.description: This adds new entries to ldap directory

operations.name: searchEntry
operations.description: This searches entries in ldap directory

operations.name: updateEntry
operations.description: This updates entries in ldap directory

operations.name: updateName
operations.description: This updates names in ldap directory

operations.name: deleteEntry
operations.description: This deletes entries in ldap directory

operations.name: authenticate
operations.description: This does authentication of a given user
